user-email.wrongEmail: this is not a first responder email we recognise
user-email.maxlength: You must enter no more than 15,000 characters

what-happened.required: You must enter details of the exploitation
what-happened.maxlength: You must enter no more than 15,000 characters

potential-victim-exploitative-situation-.required: Select if the potential victim been in more than one exploitative situation

when-did-the-exploitation-take-place-mul.maxlength: Details when the exploitations happened must be 15000 characters or less

what-were-they-required-to-do.required: Enter what were they required to do

still-in-exploitative-situation.required: Select if the potential victim is still in an exploitative situation

what-is-keeping-them-in-situation.required: Explain what is keeping the potential victim in the situation
what-is-keeping-them-in-situation.maxlength: Reasons about what is keeping the potential victim in the situation must be 15000 characters or less

when-last-contact.required: Tell us when they were last in contact

why-report-now.required: Enter anything that prevented the potential victim from reporting this sooner

evidence-of-dishonesty-details.required: Enter indicators or evidence of dishonesty

where-exploitation-happened-uk-city-1.required: You must select a city or town from the list

where-exploitation-happened-overseas-cou.required: You must select a country from the list

current-pv-location-uk-city.equal: You must select a city from the list

current-pv-location-uk-region.equal: You must select a region from the list

who-exploited-pv.required: You must enter details about the exploiter(s)
who-exploited-pv.maxlength: You must enter no more than 15,000 characters

exploiters-location.required: Tell us if you have information about where the exploiters are

are-exploiters-in-the-uk.required: Tell us if the exploiters are in the UK

exploiters-current-location-details.required: Tell us what information you have about the exploiters' location

types-of-exploitation-forced-to-work.at-least-one-option-selected: You must select an exploitation type

other-exploitation-details.required: Please enter other type of exploitation
other-exploitation-details.maxlength: You must enter no more than 15,000 characters

other-potential-victims-yes-details.maxlength: Details of other potential victims must be 15000 characters or less

other-potential-victims-not-sure-details.maxlength: Details of other potential victims must be 15000 characters or less

future-exploitation-concerns.required: Tell us if there are concerns about re-exploitation in the future

future-exploitation-reasons.required: Tell us why there are concerns
future-exploitation-reasons.maxlength: You must enter no more than 15,000 characters

reported-to-police-police-forces.required: You must select a police force from the list

authorities-cooperation.required: Tell us if the potential victim will co-operate with public authorities

does-pv-need-support.required: You must select if support is required

pv-dob.date: You must enter a valid date

pv-dob.after: You must enter a valid date. The date cannot be too far in the past
